column1: Services will be at 10:00 AM Monday
column3: 2015 at Christ the King Catholic Church. Visitation will begin at 10:00 AM until 9:00 PM with a rosary at 6:00 PM Sunday
column5: 2015 at Johnson Funeral Home. Visitation will resume at 8:00 AM until 9:30 AM Monday
column7: 2015 at Johnson Funeral Home. Burial will be at Sweetlake Grand Lake Community Cemetery.
